data.eml:eml: Review and analysis of information on the biology and morphology of immature stages of robber flies (Diptera: Asilidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dennis, Steve, Barnes, Jeffrey K., Knutson, Lloyd (2013): Review and analysis of information on the biology and morphology of immature stages of robber flies (Diptera: Asilidae). Zootaxa 3673 (1): 1-64, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3673.1.1
